vocabulary.definition: the most important city in a country

article_caption: The busy streets of Tokyo, Japan

article_paragraphs.text: Last summer, my family visited Tokyo. Tokyo is the capital city of Japan. It is a huge and exciting place. We flew on a big airplane to get there. When we arrived, I was surprised to see so many people. The streets were very crowded.

Tokyo is a mix of old and new things. One day, we visited a beautiful old temple. It was quiet and peaceful. The next day, we went to a modern area with tall buildings and bright lights. We saw robots and cool gadgets in the shops.
The best part of the trip was the food. We ate sushi and noodles. Everything was delicious! We also rode the fast trains. They are always on time. I want to go back to Tokyo someday.
